UIC students, employees, and visitors enjoy a plethora of programs, amenities, and services.  ————————————————————————–      ***COVID-19 Special Announcement***  Beginning Saturday, March 28, changes to the Student Centers hours are as follows:  SCE  Monday – Friday 10 am – 6 pm  Saturday-Sunday 10 am – 12pm  SCW  Monday -Friday 8am-2pm  Sunday-Saturday CLOSED  Please continue checking here for building updates.
